subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Modano scored the tie-breaking goal early in Dallas’s four-goal third period as the Stars defeated the San Jose Sharks, 5-2, in Game 2 of their Western Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Mike Modano scored the tie-breaking goal early in Dallas’s four-goal third period as the Stars defeated the San Jose Sharks, 5-2, in Game 2 of their Western Conference semifinal series.
